front.title: IPv6 via IPv4 Service Provider Networks

abstract.t: This document specifies a protocol mechanism tailored to advancedeployment of IPv6 to end users via a Service Provider's IPv4 networkinfrastructure. Key aspects include automatic IPv6 prefix delegationto sites, stateless operation, simple provisioning, and service whichis equivalent to native IPv6 outside of the SP's IPv4 networkinfrastructure.
